plays.text: Penalty to Sergei Gonchar 2 minutes for Hooking Ruslan Fedotenko
2 minute Bench Penalty for Too Many Men on the Ice served by Ruslan Fedotenko
Goal scored by Vaclav Prospal assisted by Vincent Lecavalier AND Ruslan Fedotenko
Penalty to Brooks Orpik 2 minutes for Boarding Paul Ranger
Penalty to Dick Tarnstrom 2 minutes for Interference Martin St. Louis
Penalty to Sergei Gonchar 2 minutes for Hooking Fredrik Modin
Penalty to Josef Melichar 2 minutes for Holding Dan Boyle
Goal scored by Ruslan Fedotenko assisted by Vincent Lecavalier AND Brad Richards
Penalty to Sidney Crosby 2 minutes for Slashing Dan Boyle
Penalty to Sidney Crosby 2 minutes for Unsportsmanlike Conduct(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Ruslan Fedotenko 2 minutes for Holding the Stick Brooks Orpik
Goal scored by Vincent Lecavalier assisted by Vaclav Prospal AND Cory Sarich
Goal scored by Zigmund Palffy assisted by Sidney Crosby
